text: 22.36: Ru 22.49Mbe maaŋ ana nzuaim, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Maaŋgi, nde ntigem ŋkɨɨa vhui dama ndera thige kɨv, nde niŋge ndigip, nde vhɨra wari wo bigi ndi vhui tharge ndigiri. Nde ntari ga mbui kos ki fhu, nde wari wo fhava shaa the ndim maaŋrim, mbe ana vhezgirim, nde mba ŋkɨɨar wari ndiv, ntari ga mbui kos the vhezgiri.
